title: Vineyard application configuration schema.
description: This JSON schema defines the root JSON file to define a  application.

id.title: Application ID.
id.description: Required. Application id which is unique in Napa.
id.name: id

description.title: Application description.
description.description: Required. Purpose and scope of this application.
description.name: description

allowPerRequestOverride.title: Allow per-request override schema.
allowPerRequestOverride.description: Whether to allow per-request override for this application.
allowPerRequestOverride.name: allowPerRequestOverride

defaultExecutionStack.title: Default execution stack consists of a list of interceptor names.
defaultExecutionStack.description: Optional. If not specified, will inherit from Host configuration.
defaultExecutionStack.name: defaultExecutionStack

items.title: Interceptor name
items.description: Interceptor are stacked as execution stack. .

objectTypes.title: Object type definition files.
objectTypes.description: Required. Object types supported in this application.
objectTypes.name: objectTypes

items.title: Path of an object type definition file
items.description: Multiple object type definition file is supported.

namedObjects.title: Named objects definition files.
namedObjects.description: Required. Named objects are objects that you want to access them by app.getObject('<name>').
namedObjects.name: namedObjects

items.title: Path of a named object definition file.
items.description: Multiple named object definition file is supported.

objectProviders.title: Object providers definition files.
objectProviders.description: Optional. Object providers are functions that provide objects by URI.
objectProviders.name: objectProviders

items.title: Path of an object provider definition file.
items.description: Multiple object provider definition file is supported.

metrics.title: Metrics collection definition.
metrics.description: Performance metricss definition for current application.
metrics.name: metricss

definition.title: Definition files
definition.description: A list of metrics definition files.
definition.name: definition

items.title: Path of a metrics definition file
items.description: Multiple metrics definition file is supported.
